emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Rev. Robert Y. Kincheloe, Rev. Robert E. Andreen, Mayor Joseph E. Barr, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, Rev. John K. Bibby, and W. Stuart Forsyth, standing in Bethesda United Presbyterian Church for dedication ceremony
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1961, pg. 15 reads: "Dedication Ceremony - Top religious and civic leaders who participated in the impressive dedication ceremonies for the newly acquired Bethesda United Presbyterian Church, 7020 Bennett St., last Sunday afternoon, were (left to right): Rev. Robert Y. Kincheloe, executive secretary of the Council of Churches; Rev. Robert E. Andreen, senior vice moderator of the Pittsburgh Presbytery; Mayor Joseph E. Barr, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, host pastor; Rev. John K. Bibby, General Presbyter, and W. Stuart Forsyth, registered architect. Approximately 1,000 members and friends shared in rites and festivities. - Harris Photo."
